# vsub

> Bash-style variable substitution C library and tool.


# Development

Requires [Docker](https://www.docker.com) and [Task](https://taskfile.dev).

Build and enter *development environment*:

```shell
# host system
$ task dev
```

## Development environment

```shell
# docker container
root@vsub:/build$ task compile  # compile and execute ðŸš€
root@vsub:/build$ vsub --help
root@vsub:/build$ task test     # run tests ðŸ”¥
root@vsub:/build$ task debug    # debug ðŸš‘
```

## Syntax research

```shell
# host system
$ task research
```
